result.name: ssdi
result.notes: SpatialData.gov.scot is Scotland’s catalogue of geospatial data. Here you can find, share and reuse spatial data provided by Scottish public sector organisations.

organization.name: scottish-government-spatial-data-infrastructure
organization.title: Scottish Government SpatialData.gov.scot
organization.description: SpatialData.gov.scot is Scotland’s catalogue of geospatial data. Here you can find, share and reuse spatial data provided by Scottish public sector organisations.

result.title: SpatialData.gov.scot
